repository.description: Information about the repository to which the label belongs.

node_id.description: A unique identifier for the label at the GitHub API level.

url.description: URL that provides direct access to the label resource.

name.description: The name of the label used for identification.

description.description: Descriptive text providing additional information about the label.

color.description: The color associated with the label, typically used for visual representation.

default.description: Indicates if the label is the default label for the repository.
